translations: v.摇逗（放在膝上的孩子）；上下轻摇；宠溺，纵容

phrs.translation: 抱着逗弄, 娇养, 娇养小孩, 摇逗

sentences.sentence: How can I know who manage this ship (for example: MV DANDLE)?
sentences.translation: 怎么知道某条船的船舶管理公司是哪家？

sentences.sentence: "Pet toys" as a training tool, also suitable for you and your family love dandle play, enhance feelings, make people feel more at ease.
sentences.translation: 【宠物玩具】可作个训宠工具，也适合于您和您家爱宠一起玩耍，增进感情，使您心情更加舒畅。
